OrganizationDescription.OrganizationDescriptionText: Here is a description of the organization.

SampleCollectionMethod.MethodName: HOBO? U22 Water Temp Pro v2
SampleCollectionMethod.MethodDescriptionText: Depending on water conditions and desired measurement location, the logger should be appropriately weighted, secured, and protected. Some monitoring applications require precise placement of the temperature sensor, such as measuring the temperature of a flow at the bottom of a stream or river. Ensure that the logger is appropriately secured so that the temperature sensor is in the desired measurement location.
